text:
Never played Beyond Good and Evil as a kid. Never heard of it. Bought it on PSN last night because I had money to spare and the screenshots looked nice.

Loved every second of this game after the credits rolled. The characters were wonderful, as was the soundtrack. I miss Hillys already!
author: TheAwesomeSpork

text: Yeah, this game supposedly didn't sell very well back in the day, that's why there was no sequel of any kind. I believe that the sequel may be in the works though. :)

text: But however bad the sales, the game manage to build such a strong bond between him and his newly created community of fans. It marked my childhood forever.

text: I just want Christophe Heral to make new music.  I've come to terms with the fact that Beyond Good and Evil 2 isn't coming any time soon, and I've pinpointed this music as the largest success of that game.  I keep coming back to these tunes over and over again.  They have yet to lose their luster.

text: @Fransinn3 Anything can work for the Wii. You simply need to wonder "Do I want motion controls or not?" If yes, then the answers obvious with the Remote & Nunchuck. If no, then the answer still ought to be obvious(and yet it eludes developers)with Gamecube controller or classic controller, or even the standard nunchuck combo, just not bothering to use any motion controls. Just because they're there doesn't mean they have to be used.
